title: ICE: compiler/rustc_borrowck/src/universal_regions.rs:882:36: cannot convert `RePlaceholder(Placeholder { bound: BoundRegion { kind: BrNamed})` to a region vid

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: S-has-mcve
labels.description: A Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example has been found for this issue

body:
### Code https://github.com/cryfs/cryfs/commit/ae730ecafb8af2651540e09e4dba1d76160222e4 In that commit, go to folder `src/blockstore/rust/cryfs-cli` and run ```cargo check``` ### Meta (tested in nightly, stable 1.69 and stable 1.70) `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.70.0 (90c541806 2023-05-31) binary: rustc commit-hash: 90c541806f23a127002de5b4038be731ba1458ca commit-date: 2023-05-31 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.70.0 LLVM version: 16.0.2 ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_borrowck/src/universal_regions.rs:882:36: cannot convert `RePlaceholder(Placeholder { universe: U1, bound: BoundRegion { var: 0, kind: BrNamed(DefId(168:840 ~ cryfs_cryfs[97fd]::filesystem::device::CryDevice::'a), 'a) } })` to a region vid ```
Backtrace
